message: Welcome! This product is guaranteed to be high-quality. Invest in something that will provide genuine value and satisfaction. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a premium item.

I'd like to pass on this one, Alice. I'd like to see some data on the products before making a purchase. Can you share the sales record after I buy this product, so I can make a more informed decision on the next one?

Hello! I appreciate your interest. With every purchase, we're committed to transparency. After your purchase, I'll share our sales record with you, including the quality of products sold. This way, you can make informed decisions for future purchases. Trust in the quality of our high-quality items today!

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd appreciate it if you could tell me the probability of it being high-quality based on the initial conditions, since I don't have any prior data to inform my decision.
